name: destiny-bond
effect: If the user faints before its next move, the Pok√©mon that fainted it will automatically faint. End-of-turn damage is ignored. This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
short_effect: If the user faints this turn, the target automatically will, too.

flavor_text.gold-silver: The foe faints if the user does.
flavor_text.crystal: The foe faints if the user does.
